content: SaaS comp: Customer support platform; ARR $48.7M; GM 82%; NRR 112%; GRR 92%; churn 8%/yr; CAC payback 13 mo; revenue multiple 7.2x; EV/EBITDA 24x. Risks: 70% SMB mix; FX 40% EUR; upsell concentrated in top 15 accounts.
DevTools comp: CI/CD; ARR $23.4M; GM 87%; NRR 119%; churn 5%/yr; payback 11 mo; revenue multiple 9.1x; EV/EBITDA n.m. (-8% margin). Risks: heavy open-source dependency; monetization tightening.
Cybersecurity MDR: ARR $61.2M; GM 74%; NRR 108%; churn 6%/yr; EBITDA margin 12%; EV/Revenue 6.4x; EV/EBITDA 53x. Risks: Tier-2 MSSP overlap; hiring bottleneck for analysts.
Fintech B2B payments: TPV $4.1B; take-rate 58 bps; net revenue $23.8M; GM 63%; NRR 126%; churn 3%/yr; EV/Revenue 10.5x. Risks: card network fee changes; compliance exposure in DE/FR.
Healthcare IT (RCM): Revenue $38.5M; GM 68%; EBITDA margin 18%; EV/Revenue 4.3x; EV/EBITDA 24x; churn 7%/yr. Risks: payer mix volatility; ICD coding updates.
Industrial IoT: ARR $14.9M; GM 76%; hardware COGS drag improving; NRR 115%; churn 9%/yr; EV/Revenue 5.2x. Risks: on-prem installs slow; capex budgets lumpy.
Logistics tech (TMS): ARR $29.7M; GM 79%; NRR 110%; churn 6%/yr; EBITDA margin 9%; EV/Revenue 6.1x; EV/EBITDA 68x. Risks: diesel price sensitivity; broker exposure.
EdTech enterprise upskilling: ARR $18.1M; GM 84%; NRR 104%; churn 11%/yr; payback 15 mo; EV/Revenue 3.8x. Risks: budget cycles tied to HR cutbacks.
PropTech facilities mgmt: ARR $22.6M; GM 72%; NRR 109%; churn 8%/yr; EBITDA margin 6%; EV/Revenue 4.9x. Risks: CRE vacancy headwinds.
AI infra (vector DB): ARR $12.2M; GM 91%; NRR 132%; churn 4%/yr; payback 8 mo; EV/Revenue 14.2x. Risks: cloud incumbents bundling; workload seasonality.
Target: vertical CRM for insurance brokers; ARR $9.8M; GM 83%; growth 38% YoY; churn 7%/yr; NRR 116%; top 3 customers 19% ARR; EBITDA margin 14%. Risks: regulatory changes to commission caps in UK.
Target: field service SaaS; ARR $16.4M; GM 80%; growth 27% YoY; churn 10%/yr; NRR 106%; CAC payback 12 mo; FX 55% GBP revenue; EBITDA margin 11%. Risks: app store dependency for mobile distro.
Target: marketing automation; ARR $33.3M; GM 78%; growth 18% YoY; churn 12%/yr; NRR 101%; EBITDA margin 5%; EV ask implies 5.5x ARR. Risks: cookie deprecation; high SMB churn.
Data observability: ARR $20.5M; GM 89%; NRR 124%; churn 5%/yr; EBITDA margin -4%; EV/Revenue 11.6x. Risks: crowded category; buyer fatigue on tooling sprawl.
HRIS mid-market: ARR $42.0M; GM 76%; NRR 107%; churn 9%/yr; EBITDA margin 8%; EV/Revenue 5.6x; EV/EBITDA 70x. Risks: payroll compliance variance by state.
Payments fraud platform: ARR $26.9M; GM 88%; NRR 129%; churn 3%/yr; payback 9 mo; EV/Revenue 12.1x. Risks: model drift with new fraud vectors.
Vertical ERP for food manufacturing: ARR $13.4M; GM 71%; NRR 111%; churn 7%/yr; EBITDA margin 15%; EV/Revenue 4.6x. Risks: on-prem customizations inflate PS cost.
Voice of Customer (n=18): strength—workflow coverage and audit trail. Pain—slow cross-geo search; stale pricing docs. Renewal risk: two EMEA accounts cite FX pressure.
Board update: Q4 bookings +31% YoY; mix 58% expansion; gross churn 6.4%; net expansion 19%; cash burn $0.8M/qtr; hiring freeze lifted for sales engineers.
Security: SOC 2 Type II in place; DPA with SCCs; data residency options: EU/US; PII discovery weekly; no subprocessor changes since 2024-08. Risks: pending ISO 27001 renewal.
Marketplace (B2B wholesale): GMV $620M; take-rate 1.7%; net revenue $10.5M; GM 65%; EBITDA margin -12%; EV/Revenue 3.2x. Risks: supply concentration; credit risk on net-terms.
LegalTech (e-discovery): ARR $31.1M; GM 81%; NRR 113%; churn 6%/yr; EBITDA margin 17%; EV/Revenue 6.8x. Risks: pricing pressure from bundles in suites.
InsurTech claims AI: ARR $15.6M; GM 79%; NRR 121%; churn 4%/yr; payback 10 mo; EV/Revenue 8.9x. Risks: model explainability; regulatory scrutiny.

Target: multilingual CS agent using RAG; ARR $7.2M; GM 85%; growth 42% YoY; churn 8%/yr; NRR 117%; top-10 customers 41% ARR; EBITDA margin 10%; asking price $36.0M → 5.0x ARR. Risks: FX exposure 60% EUR, sparse eval harness; dependency on single LLM vendor.
